author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Ghost Story Games must have sensed that we were becoming antsy about Judas, so the studio has dropped the first of seemingly multiple Dev Logs today, with this one talking about the game's complex, Shadow of Mordor-like "Villainy" system.
title: Ken Levine's Judas Reemerges With Dev Log Highlighting New System That Lets Your Choices Decide the Story's Villain

description: How does Return to Silent Hill connect to the other movies? What games is this movie adapting? Here's everything you need to know.
title: How Does Return to Silent Hill Connect to the Other Movies?

description: Starfield developer Bethesda has finally teased some of the upcoming changes coming to the game, confirming improvements to space gameplay “to make the travels there more rewarding.”
title: Following Datamine Leak, Bethesda Confirms Starfield Space Gameplay Revamp ‘To Make the Travels There More Rewarding’

author: Eric Song
description: 600W AC outlets with pure sine wave inverter, 100W USB Type-C ports, smart functionality, and more.
title: The Allpowers R600 299Wh LiFePO4 Power Station Drops to Just $134.60, More Features Than Ecoflow

description: The GameSir X5s attaches to phones...
title: GameSir Releases the X5s, a Versatile Take On Its Budget Smartphone Controller

description: We review Walmart's in-house and budget-friendly option for Switch 2 storage upgrades.
title: Onn microSD Express Card Review: You Get What You Pay for (And It’s Fine)

author: Vikki Blake
description: Microsoft is beta testing more cloud games and PC crossplay for Game Pass Core and Standard subscribers.
title: Xbox Insiders On Cheaper Game Pass Tiers Can Now Stream More Cloud Games And Access PC Versions of (Some of) the Games They Own

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Marvel star Karen Gillan has opened up about the “flak” she’s still receiving for the skimpy outfits her character Ruby Roundhouse wore in the Jumanji reboot films — which it seems a lot of fans may have missed the irony on.
title: Marvel Star Karen Gillan Says She's Still Getting Weird 'Flak' for Her Skimpy Jumanji Costume Despite It Being a Clear Joke About Sexualized Outfits for Female Video Game Characters

author: Tom Phillips
description: Sony has announced the PlayStation Plus monthly lineup of games for September 2025, which includes a Xbox-published game and a hugely popular farming title.
title: Sony Announces PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for September 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: A group of individuals who formerly worked at the now-shuttered Cliffhanger Games on its canceled Black Panther game have been picked up by Wizards of the Coast for a new project.
title: Former Black Panther Developers Join Wizards of the Coast for New Game Project

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Funko's new line of Alien: Earth Pop! figures are as adorable as they are terrifying, Check them out for yourself.
title: These Funko Pop! Alien: Earth Figures Are Adorably Terrifying

author: Vikki Blake
description: Dragon’s Dogma 2 director Hideaki Itsuno says he is "very proud" of the highly anticipated sequel even though the game may not have suited "a certain type of audience."
title: Dragon’s Dogma 2 director Hideaki Itsuno Intentionally Designed it 'Not Like a Nintendo One,' But For 'A Certain Type of Audience'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Harry Potter director Chris Columbus, who helmed the series' first two films, has shared his reaction to recent set photos of the franchise's upcoming TV reboot — and in particular, images of new Hagrid actor Nick Frost in "the exact same costume".
title: 'Part of Me Was Like, What's the Point?' Harry Potter Movie Director Unsure Why There Needs to Be a TV Remake, After Seeing Suspiciously Similar Set Photos

author: Christian Wait
description: As of Aug. 27, the Asus RTX 5080 is back at MSRP for $999.99 on Amazon, Alienware gaming PCs come with a free Battlefield 6 ahead of its Oct. 10 release, and the Pokémon TCG Surging Sparks Booster Bundle is $35.99 at TCGPlayer ($12 off Amazon’s price).
title: Deals For Today: Grab an RTX 5080 for MSRP With A Free Copy Of Borderlands 4

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: Do you have superhero fatigue yet?
title: Thunderbolts* Is Now Streaming on Disney+

author: Simon Cardy
description: Hellraiser: Revival is disgustingly violent and shockingly sexy, but maybe I'm into it.
title: Hellraiser: Revival is Resident Evil For Sickos

author: Tom Phillips
description: Last week in Cologne, Capcom's nerve-jangling Resident Evil Requiem demo was one of the highlights of the Gamescom 2025 show floor — but plenty of questions remain. Here, IGN sits down with director Koshi Nakanishi and producer Masato Kumazawa for some answers.
title: The Big Resident Evil Requiem Interview: Why the Game's Monster Got Supersized, Why it's Probably Not Lisa Trevor, and a Tease for Areas Beyond Raccoon City — Just Don't Talk About Leon

author: Tom Phillips
description: Regardless of what's been said about the game to date, Resident Evil: Requiem's director and producer want you to know that the title — scheduled for release in 2026, the series' 30th anniversary year — has more going on than a simple focus on nostalgia.
title: Whether Leon's in the Game or Not, Resident Evil Requiem Is More Than Just a 'Backwards Looking' Nostalgia Fest, Capcom Says — and It Wasn't Originally Planned as a 30th Anniversary Release at All

author: Lindsey Salzer
description: In honor of the 34th anniversary of Mario Kart, which was released in Japan on August 27, 1991, IGN Deals is giving away a Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World Bundle to one lucky winner! Here's how to enter.
title: IGN Deals Is Giving Away A Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart World Bundle

author: Matt Purslow
description: From sneaky heists all the way up to precision assassin sims, these are the 10 best stealth games.
title: The 10 Best Stealth Games

author: Vikki Blake
description: Microsoft has said it is "aware" of crashing issues with the newly released Gears of War: Reloaded on Steam and confirmed it is "investigating" amid a 'mixed' user review rating.
title: Microsoft 'Investigating' Crashing And Missing Pre-Orders As Gears of War: Reloaded Slumps to 'Mixed' Rating on Steam

author: Lex Briscuso
description: It seemed as though Season 2 of Wednesday was bound to be the same smash hit that Season 1 was. After all, the show is beloved by its huge fanbase, who highly anticipated the second season in the nearly three years it took Netflix to make it. But it turns out that Season 2 is simply not seeing anywhere close to the success that Season 1 had.
title: Wednesday Season 2 Fails to Hit the Record-Breaking Numbers of Season 1... So Far

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: The Finnish action film Sisu became an online sensation back in 2023 thanks to its relentless, over-the-top action sequences and its “imagine John Wick killing Nazis in World War II” premise. Now, "the man who refuses to die" is back in Sisu: Road to Revenge and IGN has your exclusive first look at the film’s red band trailer, which promises even more insane wall-to-wall action next time around.
title: Sisu: Road to Revenge: Exclusive Red Band Trailer for 'Crazy' Action Sequel

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: No Man’s Sky is expanding once again, this time with the free Voyagers update. Interestingly, developer Hello Games said the tech introduced with this update will be shared with its next game, Light No Fire.
title: No Man’s Sky Voyagers Update Adds Corvette Ship Class, Multiplayer Crew, and Tech That Will Be Shared With Hello Games’ Light No Fire

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The Nintendo Switch 2's second month on the market was another explosive one, at least in the U.S., where it surpassed 2 million units sold life-to-date, putting it 75% ahead of the unit sales pace set by the Nintendo Switch 1.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Has Sold 2 Million Units in the U.S., 75% Ahead of the Switch 1's Pace

author: Matt Purslow
description: We've played the first hour of The Outer Worlds 2, and its many opportunities and alternative pathways suggest another rich and flexible RPG from the experts at Obsidian.
title: The Outer Worlds 2’s First Hour Has Layers and Layers of Role-Playing Opportunities

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Chris Roberts, the chief developer of Star Citizen, has made a bold claim about next year’s single-player spinoff, Squadron 42, comparing it to the launch of behemoth Grand Theft Auto 6.
title: After Raising Over $1 Billion From Players, Star Citizen Dev Chris Roberts Hopes Squadron 42's 2026 Launch Will Be 'Almost as Big an Event' as GTA 6

author: Vikki Blake
description: Atari has acquired five chiefly dormant franchises from developer/publisher Ubisoft: Child of Eden, Cold Fear, Grow Home, Grow Up, and I Am Alive.
title: Atari Snaps Up 5 Dormant Ubisoft Franchises, Says It Will Re-Release Them On New Platforms

author: Scott Collura
description: Is it time to head to the escape pod, or stick your face just a little further over the alien egg? Let's dig in on Alien: Earth Episode 4's big revelation.
title: Alien: Earth Episode 4 Is a Litmus Test for Whether You Should Keep Watching the Show or Not

author: Tom Marks
description: This add-on offers some appetizing new levels, but left me hungry for something meteor.
title: Kirby and the Forgotten Land + Star-Crossed World Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It sounds like Elden Ring movie director Alex Garland went the extra mile to convince FromSoftware chief Hidetaka Miyazaki to give his seal of approval to the adaptation.
title: Elden Ring Superfan Alex Garland Put Together a 160-Page Draft Script – With 40 Extra Pages of Images – to Convince Hidetaka Miyazaki to Let Him Direct the Movie

author: Vikki Blake
description: Good news, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 fans! Clair Obscur is not just the shortened name for developer Sandfall Interactive's blockbuster RPG — it's also the name for an entire franchise.
title: Yes, Another Clair Obscur Game Is Coming — 'Expedition 33 is One of the Stories That We Want to Tell in This Franchise,' Teases Director

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: At gamescom 2025, IGN interviewed Saber Interactive development chief Tim Willits and asked him some sneaky Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 3 questions. Here's what he had to say.
title: With the Inquisition Watching, Tight-Lipped Saber Chief Won't Say Much About Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 3, but He Has Revealed Games Workshop Is Offering Up 'Some Ideas That Are Amazing'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Sophie Turner, who began playing Sansa Stark on HBO's Game of Thrones aged just 13, has offered some words of warning for the network's young actors set to star in the upcoming Harry Potter TV series.
title: 'It Almost Destroyed Me': Game of Thrones Teen Star Issues Warning to New Harry Potter Actors Over Fame and Social Media

author: Vikki Blake
description: The first cinematic teaser for the upcoming Silent Hill 2 adaptation, Return to Silent Hill, dropped yesterday, and once again, the community is divided by what they've seen.
title: Return to Silent Hill's First Cinematic Trailer Has Completely Divided the Community

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The backlash to Paradox’s decision to lock two clans behind DLC for Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 appears to have prompted a rethink.
title: Amid Backlash to Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 Locking Clans Behind DLC, Paradox Says It's 'Making Adjustments Ahead of Launch'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has restructured and rebranded a division that is now dedicated to developing films featuring the company's characters, such as Mario and Zelda.
title: After Super Mario Bros. Movie's Success, Nintendo Makes Clear It's Committed to Film Production With a Newly-Restructured Entertainment Division, Named Nintendo Stars

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It sounds like all change for Call of Duty with the release of Black Ops 7, amid pressure from Battlefield 6 and its commitment to “gritty realism.”
title: Amid Battlefield 6's Commitment to 'Gritty Realism,' Activision Makes Shock Call of Duty Change for Black Ops 7: 'We Hear the Feedback'

author: Eric Song
description: Every car absolutely needs a tire inflator as part of an emergency kit.
title: Save 50% Off the Jusuox Cordless Tire Inflator and Air Compressor, Now Just $15

author: Adam Mathew
description: There’s no shortage of deals tempting my wallet this week, and I’m leaning into the ones that feel like old mates I can’t quite leave behind.
title: AU Deals: Colossal Discounts on Current and Classic Games Worth Their Weight in Rupees

author: Clint Gage
description: Episode 4 of Alien: Earth pumps the brakes with a contemplative pace that asks “what if we did all of this wrong?” Here's our review.
title: Alien: Earth Episode 4 Review
